references.reason: This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), a foundational model for many of the diffusion models used in this work.

references.paper_title: Score-Based Generative Modeling through Stochastic Differential Equations
references.reason: This paper provides the continuous-time formulation of diffusion models used in this work, improving upon previous discrete-time approaches.

references.paper_title: Solving Inverse Problems in Medical Imaging with Score-Based Generative Models
references.reason: This paper directly applies score-based generative models to solve inverse problems, demonstrating the potential of diffusion models for Bayesian inference.

references.paper_title: Diffusion Posterior Sampling for General Noisy Inverse Problems
references.reason: This paper introduces a new posterior sampling method for diffusion models, addressing limitations of existing approaches and informing the posterior sampling technique used in this work.

references.paper_title: Deep Unsupervised Learning using Nonequilibrium Thermodynamics
references.reason: This paper introduces the theoretical underpinnings of diffusion models, establishing the connection between nonequilibrium thermodynamics and generative modeling.
